public co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId)

public co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId,

      • getWorkflowToken

        @Deprecated
public co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId,
                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                 WorkflowToken.Scope scope,
                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                 String key)
                                                        throws IOException,
                                                               co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                                                               co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException,
                                                               co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use getWorkflowToken(ProgramRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope, String) instead.
        Retrieve the WorkflowToken for the specified workflow run filtered by the specified WorkflowToken.Scope and key.
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - the Id.Run of the workflow
        scope - the specified WorkflowToken.Scope. If null, it returns keys for WorkflowToken.Scope#USER
        key - the specified key. If null, it returns all keys in the specified WorkflowToken.Scope
        Returns:
        WorkflowTokenDetail with the specified filters
        Throws:
        IOException
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException

      • getWorkflowToken

        public co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      WorkflowToken.Scope scope,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      String key)
                                                        throws IOException,
                                                               co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                                                               co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException,
                                                               co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Retrieve the WorkflowToken for the specified workflow run filtered by the specified WorkflowToken.Scope and key.
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - the run id of the workflow
        scope - the specified WorkflowToken.Scope. If null, it returns keys for WorkflowToken.Scope#USER
        key - the specified key. If null, it returns all keys in the specified WorkflowToken.Scope
        Returns:
        WorkflowTokenDetail with the specified filters
        Throws:
        IOException
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException

      • getWorkflowTokenAtNode

        @Deprecated
public co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail getWorkflowTokenAtNode(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId,
                                                                           String nodeName)
                                                                  throws co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                                                                         IOException,
                                                                         co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException,
                                                                         co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use getWorkflowTokenAtNode(ProgramRunId, String) instead.
        Retrieve all the key-value pairs in a workflow run's WorkflowToken that were set by the specified node.
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - the Id.Run of the workflow
        nodeName - the name of the node
        Returns:
        WorkflowTokenNodeDetail containing all the key-value pairs set by the specified node in the specified workflow run's WorkflowToken
        Throws:
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        IOException
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException

public co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail getWorkflowTokenAtNode(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId,

        Returns:

      • getWorkflowLocalDatasets

        public Map<String,co.cask.cdap.proto.DatasetSpecificationSummary> getWorkflowLocalDatasets(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId)
                                                                                    throws IOException,
                                                                                           co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                                                                                           co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException,
                                                                                           co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Get the local datasets associated with the Workflow run.
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - run id for the Workflow
        Returns:
        the map of local datasets to the DatasetSpecificationSummary
        Throws:
        IOException - if the error occurred during executing the http request
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException - if the request is not authorized successfully in the gateway server
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException - if the workflow with given runid not found
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException

      • getWorkflowNodeStates

        public Map<String,co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowNodeStateDetail> getWorkflowNodeStates(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId)
                                                                             throws IOException,
                                                                                    co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                                                                                    co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException,
                                                                                    co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Get node states associated with the Workflow run.
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - run id for the Workflow
        Returns:
        the map of node id to the WorkflowNodeStateDetail
        Throws:
        IOException - if the error occurred during executing the http request
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException - if the request is not authorized successfully in the gateway server
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException - if the workflow with given runid not found
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
